name: Paper Planes Game
description:
You are playing as a Paper Plane in a child’s imagination. Your goal is to find and collect special items around the map to unlock memories and uncover the truth behind this dream world. However not everything in the dream is friendly; avoid combat with enemies, with the help of the environment around you, lest you make the dream world unstable.

  • You can customise your plane with different plane types, materials and weapons to navigate the dream and defend yourself in new and unique ways.
  • Missions help make the quick nature of this game even more exciting with new goals to meet.
  • Fight or flee from a variety of Origami enemies and face against a challenging boss.
  • Use updrafts and gravity to your advantage, but beware the clouds and ground.
